title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 324.3 - Spray forms of certain phenoxy herbicides
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 324.3 - Spray forms of certain phenoxy herbicides

State Regulations

No person shall apply, within the affected area as set
forth in section
323.4
of this Title, any sprays of
2,4-D, 2,4-5-T or MCP in any chemical form whatever at a rate of application
less than 15 gallons per acre nor at a nozzle pressure exceeding 40 pounds per
square inch nor within 100 feet of any grape vineyard located in whole or in
part within the affected area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
324.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
